LanguageData.RATS_Settings_ZoomTimeout: How many ticks after creation until we force remove the zoom (in case of bugs): {0} ticks
LanguageData.RATS_Settings_CooldownTicks: How many ticks the RATS cooldown is: {0} ticks
LanguageData.RATS_Settings_BodyPartMultipliers: Accuracy multipliers for various body parts.
LanguageData.RATS_Settings_Gain_Per_Level_Mouseover: Values less than 1 exponentially scale to zero gain per level. Values greater than 1 exponentially scale to infinity.
LanguageData.RATS_Settings_FlatHitChanceBoost: Flat boost to aiming with RATS [{0}].
LanguageData.RATS_Settings_FlatHitChanceBoost_Mouseov: Adds a flat boost to aiming, as the calculation for hit chance at lower levels is very not fun.
LanguageData.RATS_Settings_ClampingFactor_Mouseover: Clamps the max accuracy boost, and scales appropriately
